text: The Nissan Sentra is an automobile. It has been made since 1982. It has gone through many designs and generations. Sentra started off as subcompact car in 1982. In the 1990s, the 2-door coupe and station wagon were dropped. The Sentra was a subcompact from 1982 to 1999. From 2000 and on, the Sentra was a compact car. The vehicle is made in Mexico and the United States. ==References== Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Coupes Sentra
title: Nissan Sentra
